subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera struck out Albert Pujols with the bases loaded after the Angels threatened with a five-run ninth, saving a strong performance by C. C. Sabathia and the Yankees offense.
snippet: Mariano Rivera struck out Albert Pujols with the bases loaded after the Angels threatened with a five-run ninth, saving a strong performance by C. C. Sabathia and the Yankees offense.
